name: Mr.TomatoS
description:
"Welcome to my game, buddy!"

Mr. TomatoS is glad to see you! He waited a long time for someone to visit him! Feel like at home and get ready for endless f̶u̶n̶ !

Mr. TomatoS needs YOUR help! looks like he had not eaten for ages! Of course not, he has no hands!

Feed Mr. Tomatos with big variety of food, combine it with blender, and use different items to help you with this task!

"But why should I do this?"

Glad you asked! By helping him you can earn a lot of points to spend them in the shop later! Everyone loves to earn points, right?

"Why am i always d̶y̶i̶n̶g̶ loosing?"

Glad you asked, my dear friend! j̶u̶s̶t̶ d̶o̶n̶t̶ d̶o̶w̶n̶l̶o̶a̶d̶ i̶t̶ you need a strategy to finish the game! without a strategy, everything can go wrong.

Manage your resources correctly to s̶t̶a̶y̶ a̶l̶i̶v̶e̶ win!)

unless you want to make Mr. TomatoS angry.

The game is made in the style of old web flash games, what sets her apart from other new games!

Feel the atmosphere of old flash games!

You can complete the game only ONCE, that means that you won't have a second chance. And how you will complete YOUR game - depends only on YOU. Try your best. Good luck.

Main theme by: Cnupoc (https://freesound.org/people/Cnupoc/)

Game theme by: Sirkoto51 (https://freesound.org/people/Sirkoto51/)

Sirkoto51 soundcloud :  https://soundcloud.com/sirkoto51

Some sounds by: InspectorJ(Jonathan Shaw) (https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/)

InspectorJ patreon: https://www.patreon.com/JonathanShaw

MrTomatoS

- standart version of the game.

MrTomatoS+  " Looks like Mr.TomatoS is kind today, so he prepared a small present for you! "

- start the game with 9 scissors and 1 candy in your pocket!

-don't download this version if you already played in standart version, because in that case, you won't get anything, also, your progress will remain the same as in standart version!

MrTomatoS++ " Oh oh, it looks like someone messed up the game code! "

- Now you can reset your game progress after completion to get more endings

- You can download this version even if you already played in standart version, and completed it
